thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: David LI
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 David LI

author: David LI
title: David LI
text: First I order a phone that I want, and paid. After take my money they told me that they don't have it, and they can give me another one with a gold color. For don't lose money of the transference I accept that. After 3 months the phone didn't arrive. They just told me that they will send me back the money, and of course without commission of my bank. I LOSED TIME AND MONEY WITH BANGGOOD. I can't recommend at all!
